title: Reckless Pawn
description: Freedom is never free...But what price am I willing to pay?What should have been a one-night stand turned into an obsession I can't let go.Houston is in my memories and my dreams. The one place he is NOT is in my life. Apparently, I now belong to the Sins of Wrath motorcycle club and the VP has become the latest in a ever growing line of men who want to make me heel. But I don't heel, sit or BEG.To survive, I need to break free. But first, I have to get my heart back...
author: E.M. Gayle
